about_the_game:
Take on the role of a conservationist who accidentally uncovers dark secrets of the past. During the inspection of an old church, the floor collapses beneath your feet, and you find yourself in an abandoned laboratory hiding traces of mysterious experiments that caused suffering to many. To find your way out, you must solve a series of logical puzzles, explore enigmatic rooms, and activate long-forgotten systems.

The gameplay is designed to last around an hour, offering a tense and immersive experience.

Will you find the answers, or will you become part of an endless experiment?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 version 21H1 (build 19043) or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-8100 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10/11/12 compatible GPU, e.g., Nvidia GTX 650 Ti / AMD Radeon HD 7770
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated or dedicated sound card
  • VR Support: No
  • Additional Notes: Requires a keyboard and mouse. Controller support optional.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Uncover dark secrets in this atmospheric puzzle-adventure game. Solve challenging logic puzzles, explore mysterious rooms, and reactivate forgotten systems to escape an abandoned underground laboratory. Will you uncover the truth or become part of an endless experiment?
